page.title: 11RAGLAN FUN RUN
page.content: {RAGLAN FUN RUN} Each Year Raglan Action Research for the crippled child holds a five mile fun run.This year it was held on the 5th May.Each runner had a number.A local hospital gave a radio commentary of the race.A computer registered the times of each person and a marshal gave the people their times on a certificate.It was well organised and about 800 people walked or ran.The run raised Â£4,000.A thankyou evening was organised for the helpers of the run, medals and certificates were given out and a video of the Fun Run was shown.
